author: fabiocos
body:
A new MTD geometry scenario (D33) is implemented, with bars (as in D25) but oriented along the z coordinate, instead of phi. RelVals are added in PyReleaseValidation, and the BTLDetId format is updated to accomodate navigation also according to this scenario.

The numbering scheme has been verified with the available test code, and appears correct.
title: MTD, add new geometry scenario (D33) for bars along z coordinate
